scripts.clean: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report && if exist playwright-report rmdir /s /q playwright-report && if exist test-results rmdir /s /q test-results && if exist shareable-report.html rmdir /s /q shareable-report.html && if exist test-report.pdf del test-report.pdf
scripts.test: npm run clean && npx playwright test
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results --clean --single-file --output shareable-report.html && echo Report generated: shareable-report.html/index.html
scripts.test:report: npm run test && npm run report
scripts.test:pdf: npm run test && npm run report && npm run pdf
scripts.report:pdf: npm run report && npm run pdf
